ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This work was supported by grants from the Tibetan autonomous region science and technology projects, China (Z2012Z01G03), Talents development program of Mount Qomolangma Scholar, Tibet University, China, and the National Natural Science Foundation of China (81673690). We thank Wei-dong Zhu and Lhaqiong for identifying the Waldheimia glabra samples and Dao-Feng Chen for providing the experimental platform.
